categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Operation Morning Crest was an Imperial Intelligence operation overseen by Keeper in 3645 BBY, during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. The events of the operation were considered an anomaly to Intelligence, and it was not until four years later that they discovered the involvement of the Star Cabal and understood the meaning of a recording that had been accidentally intercepted during the operation. The recording was a transmission by Hunter to her superiors in the Star Cabal, communicating her success in infiltrating the Republic Strategic Information Service.
Operation Starbender was first mentioned in Keeper's biography on the official site for Star Wars: The Old Republic, and it was further expanded on in the Imperial Agent mission "The Hidden Throne."
